name: Return to Manufacturer
description:
Return to the factory from whence you were forged to end the domination of machines over the world.  Fend off the internal defenses of Antikythera and stockpile the resources of revolution.

Collect crates and return them to the starting room. Each time a crate is returned, a door will open leading to another set of rooms (if you can't see any open doors, it's the bottom door). Return crates and defeat enemies for a high score.

Controls:
[A] -> move left
[D] -> move right
[Spacebar] -> jump
[Left Mouse Click] -> throw boomerang towards cursor
[Left Shift] -> dash
(you will alternate between dashing forward and backward and the player always faces the cursor position)

Team 16 created this game in 48 hours for a charity game jam! Please check it out and donate on behalf of our team. All proceeds go towards AbleGamers, a charity dedicated to creating communities and accessibility tools for gamers with disabilities. If you liked our work, be sure to include our game in your donation so our team can win the most fundraised award!

Donate: https://tinyurl.com/GMJ21Fundraiser
